name: Sniper City Strike Master
description:
Sniper City Strike Master is a first-person 3D shooter game. You will play as a sniper, strike terrorists. Your task is to fight against terrorists bases and destroy X City terrorist remnants, to effectively combat terrorist activities.
How to Play

- Touch screen to navigate through the axis.
- Watch for your Aim with an acute sight.
- Take head shots to kill your enemies.
- Use the full zoom option to have the clear view of targets.
